name: Gimmick Puppet - 4 or 8
text:
Choose 1 of the following effects: This Skill can only be used once per turn and twice per turn and twice per Duel.
● Change the Level of all Level 8 "Gimmick Puppet" in your hand to 4 until the end of the turn.
● Change the Level of all "Gimmick Puppet" monsters on your field to 8 until the end of the turn.
